comments:
Description:
NPE when set parent width to label text in script.

Build number:2.2.0.v20070118

Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a Grid.
2. Insert a Label to grid cell.
3. Select the Label and swith to Script Viewer.
4. Input this.text=this.getParent().width in onCreate method.
5. Preview

Expected result:
Display parent width.

Actual result:
NPE.

Error log:
Label (id = 7): 
- There are errors evaluating script "this.text=this.getParent().width;". 
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )

if the instance of the class DimensionType is not null, return its value
or, return a null value

fixed.

At present, no exception and the text will not changed because label's parent is cell and cell has no width.
